body_html:
It is fairly easy for this cmake test to misfire and prevent you from building ATen when you would have succeeded. All you need is to:

  1. Run Ubuntu 17.04
  2. Have manually built / procured a copy of GCC 5 which doesn't have the bug

It would have been far better to have added a CHECK_CXX_SOURCE_COMPILES test for the missing symbols and fail if this compile test fails.
body_text:

Run Ubuntu 17.04
Have manually built / procured a copy of GCC 5 which doesn't have the bug

It would have been far better to have added a CHECK_CXX_SOURCE_COMPILES test for the missing symbols and fail if this compile test fails.
body:
It is fairly easy for this cmake test to misfire and prevent you from building ATen when you would have succeeded. All you need is to:

1. Run Ubuntu 17.04
2. Have manually built / procured a copy of GCC 5 which doesn't have the bug

It would have been far better to have added a `CHECK_CXX_SOURCE_COMPILES` test for the missing symbols and fail if this compile test fails.
